text: 1.12 Dan 9.24, Epe 3.10, Hib 11.13, 11.39-40 Pɨyowɨl yelaknɨŋ God kɨlop mɨseŋ yomak, tap okok kɨli nɨŋɨd agñɨlak ak, tap kɨli ke mel, tap nɨbi. Pen mɨñɨl God ne Kawnan ne ak agyokek, man ne alaŋ nɨb apɨl, bɨ ogɨnap kɨlop gos anɨb ak tek ñak. Ñek, God gup anɨb ak takaw teplep ak nɨbop agñel, nɨgtep gɨpɨm. Ensel okok abe, takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, God binɨb okok kɨlop tay tek gɨnɨgab agɨl gos nepal.
